abstract: United Nations investigates two new cases of suspected sexual abuse committed by peace keepers in Central African Republic, contributing to growing number of sexual abuse allegations against peacekeepers in area; investigation begins two weeks after Security Council passed resolution that endorses toughened discipline against violators.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Central African Republic: More Peacekeepers Accused
headline.main: Central African Republic: More Peacekeepers Accused

snippet: The United Nations is investigating two new suspected cases of sexual abuse committed by peacekeepers in the Central African Republic.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations is investigating two new suspected cases of sexual abuse committed by peacekeepers in the Central African Republic.
